verbose_text: The chromatin pellet was digested with micrococcal nuclease (NEB) for 4-5 minutes at 37degreesC and the supernatant containing the open chromatin fraction was incubated for 1 hour with magnetic bead bound antibodies to either Pol II total CTD (MABI601, MBL) or Pol II Ser5P CTD (MABI603, MBL).
evidence: bound antibodies to either Pol II total CTD (MABI601, MBL) or Pol II Ser5P CTD (MABI603
